job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description:
GoCanvas is on the lookout for an extremely talented Engineer who has a passion for web software and the mobile revolution. Your mission is to maintain, develop, and improve the GoCanvas Platform, making our vision for the GoCanvas product become a reality. You’ll be central to the team unleashing the power of distributed technology for our tens of thousands of customers worldwide.
You will work within a small yet capable Agile team environment. Your work will be incredibly impactful to our customers, helping them to run their business with powerful workforce management features like mobile dispatch and workflow management — all with a delightful user experience that makes complex technology approachable.
You’ll receive training to become familiar with our culture, systems, mobile app platform, and strategy. You’ll gain tremendous experience in scaling a rapidly growing SaaS company. We’re looking for A-players who believe in our mission, share our values, and aren’t afraid to join us on this game-changing ride!
Your Most Important Projects:
Work with your engineering team to build high-quality, well-tested software in our core Ruby on Rails web application
Deliver functionality that helps GoCanvas customers manage their mobile workforce, define and automate workflows, and sync with a global fleet of mobile devices running GoCanvas
Consider the security of all facets of our software
Work with outstanding product development, design, and user experience teams to build a web business platform that’s easy to pick up and delightful to use
What Success Looks Like:
Build quality software that positively impacts GoCanvas customers
Never stop learning and never stop applying what you learn back into GoCanvas
Build effective working relationships and display effective communication with teams
What You Bring:
Proficiency with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and knowledge of web standards
Experience with a modern front-end JavaScript framework (React, Angular, Vue.js)
Experience with one or more common web application frameworks, e.g. Ruby on Rails (preferred), Django, Spring, Express, etc.
Experience working with Bootstrap, Material, Tailwind, or internal design systems
Familiarity with defensive programming techniques, cybersecurity, and developer tools that highlight potential risks
Strong fundamental knowledge of software engineering design patterns and hands-on experience with development best practices
A passion for amazing products and great engineering teams
Strong self-organization and self-management skills
Excellent written and oral communication skills
The desire to be a part of a team that’s just as passionate as you
So, What’s GoCanvas?
GoCanvas is a mobile platform that makes it simple for businesses to automate how work is done, replacing outdated processes and expensive paperwork. The GoCanvas App works on smartphones and tablets, helping companies easily collect information across their organization, share it instantly, and gain real-time insight on their business operations. GoCanvas can be easily customized by all types of businesses to empower their workforce, unleashing the value in data across the organization to help better connect with colleagues and engage more effectively with customers. Automating millions of workplace activities for well-known brands like Pepsi, Honda, and Red Bull means there's a good chance you have been around someone using GoCanvas in the past 24 hours, making us one of the fastest-growing mobile platforms in the world!
Our recent achievements as an organization include The 2020 Golden Bridge Award for Company Rethinking of the Year, and being named by Deloitte as one of the
What GoCanvas Brings
We believe hiring the right people is THE most important thing we do. We take our values seriously and look for these traits in everyone we hire: Empathy, Innovation, Authenticity, Impactful, Team Player, and Cheeky/Fun Loving. We believe in giving people the freedom to work, but staying inspired by their important metrics, to think and act like owners of our business. We provide an environment that allows for innovation and creativity and a chance for individuals passionate about their role to have fun at work. You can learn more about recent activities on our

Unlimited Vacation Policy (also known as unlimited PTO)
13 Company-Paid Holidays (which include GoCanvas's Birthday, Earth Day, and Juneteenth to name a few)
Medical Insurance (where the Employee Only level of coverage is free!)
Dental and Vision Insurance with employer contribution
Health Savings or Flexible Spending Account depending upon your medical plan selection
Basic Term Life Insurance and Personal Accident Insurance
Voluntary Life Insurance

401k plan with employer match
Pet Insurance
Parental Leave
